mapper.select: select MOVIE_NO as movieNo, MOVIE_IMAGE_FILENAME as movieImageFileName from MOVIE_IMAGE where MOVIE_NO = #{value}

select MOVIE_NO as movieNo, MOVIE_TRAILER_URL_ADDRESS as movieTrailerURLAddress, MOVIE_TRAILER_TITLE as movieTrailerTitle, MOVIE_TRAILER_CREATED_DATE as movieTrailerCreatedDate from MOVIE_TRAILER where MOVIE_NO = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into movie (MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_TITLE_EN, MOVIE_RATE, MOVIE_OPEN_DATE, MOVIE_RUNTIME) values (#{no}, #{title}, #{titleEn} #{rate}, #{openDate}, #{runtime})
insert into movie_actor (MOIVE_NO, ACTOR_NO) values (#{movieNo}, movie_actor_seq.nextval)
insert into MOVIE_DIRECTOR (MOIVE_NO, DIRECTOR_NO) values (#{movieNo}, movie_director_seq.nextval)
insert into MOVIE_GENRE (MOIVE_NO, GENRE_NO) values (#{movieNo}, MOVIE_GENRE_SEQUNCE_SEQ.nextval)
